DOC.brief_summary: The objective of the study is to observe the safety, efficacy and cost effectiveness of the Edwards SAPIEN XT valve for the treatment of severe calcific degenerative aortic stenosis.
DOC.detailed_description: This is a multi-centre, prospective, consecutively enrolled, non-randomized clinical trial. The comparatator group will consist of subjects undergoing surgical aortic valve replacement in Cohort A of the PARTNER II Trial.
